text: The total medal count for all Asian Winter Games from 1986 Asian Winter Games in Sapporo, Japan to 2017 Asian Winter Games in Sapporo, Japan is tabulated below. ==Medals (1986-2017)== ==Related pages== *All-time Asian Games medal table (Summer Games) * All-time Asian Para Games medal table ==References== *OCA Winter
title: All-time Asian Winter Games medal table
